degree_title: Master of Science in Computer Science
details: After working for over two and a half years as a Software Engineer at LIST, left my hometown Mumbai and moved away to US to pursue Master's degree in Computer Science from Portland State University.

degree_title: Bachelor of Engineering in Information Technology
details: Completed my Undergraduate degree from a college named "Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai" which is affiliated by University of Mumbai and is located in India.
